resources.string:
The KotlinConf application is developed by the JetBrains team using Kotlin Multiplatform with shared logic. Compose Multiplatform is utilized for both the Android and iOS apps.
For the source code and more technical details, visit the GitHub repository.

For you to maximize the benefits of this app, we need your consent to access and use your device ID so you can provide and we can collect and track your feedback about talks.
We will process your data in accordance with the App Privacy Policy. You can adjust or withdraw your consent at any time by sending a request to privacy@jetbrains.com, but doing so may affect how this app functions.
Customize your preferences to ensure you receive only the notifications that matter to you, avoiding unnecessary disruptions.
Get talk reminders and important information during the event. We recommend keeping this setting enabled to receive timely notifications about any changes.
Receive news in between KotlinConf events, including notifications about ticket sales, new videos, contests, schedule announcements, and more.
KotlinConf 2024 General Terms and Conditions for Visitors
